text:
Order completely KO
Impossible to reorder
Quick one. Has anyone created a blog on HubSpot then use the RSS feed to pull latests blogs into a Shopify site before?
We canâ€™t reorder flex columns either. AHH!
yeah, ours are still broken - <@U22PU4G4A> <@U22PJPGK0> , not sure who works on this area
Our page revisions are also gone.
Hey team! We are currently looking into the flex columns issue now. Thanks for your patience
So with the new service hub, how does one go about creating pages/categories in the knowledgebase?
Looks like I was able to access the area from the sprocket menu, but I am not sure where to find this in the main nav to get to it

I have a client that is wanting to do a page redesign, on HubSpot CMS. It shouldn't require too much function, just mainly design and CSS, making sure it looks amazing on mobile. If anyone is interested, can you please DM me with some sample HubSpot CMS design work and a ballpark price range for one page redesign. Thanks!
Hi <@U9X4A0X9B> just sent you a DM
I should understand the kind of page, amount of text, images, need of custom modules to quote it
Is there anyone from the HubSpot Marketplace Team on this Slack? I need to ask some questions about a theme that a client purchased that doesnt seem to be working correctly.
Overall, this theme had JS links to a file hosted another portal ID which i though was against the marketplace requirements and also it looks like if you use it in DMv2, all the CM's are broken
Also, is there a way to downgrade a module in the DM? After I upgraded them, switched back to DMv1 and went to modules they are now gone

I would uninstall and reinstall theme but from what I can see (when testing on our dev portal) uninstalling doesnt remove the custom modules of the theme and when re-installing, it doesnt override the old CM's and instead creates duplicates with timestampes appended to the name of the module

hey.
Which portal, template do you have problem with?
